result.eng: We do not live in the the twentieth century any more!
result.ga: Ní san fhichiú haois a mhaireann muid a thuilleadh
result.orig: Ní san fhichiú haois a mhaireann muid a thuilleadh
result.html: Ní san fhichiú haois a mhaireann muid a thuilleadhWe do not live in the the twentieth century any more!
result.ponchtml: Ní san ḟiċiú haois a ṁaireann muid a ṫuilleaḋWe do not live in the the twentieth century any more!

result.eng: Everything only lasts for a short time.
result.ga: Ní mhaireann aon ní ach seal
result.orig: Ní mhaireann aon ní ach seal
result.html: Ní mhaireann aon ní ach sealEverything only lasts for a short time.
result.ponchtml: Ní ṁaireann aon ní aċ sealEverything only lasts for a short time.
